agro_products.name: No Virus Chilli
agro_products.discription: Geolife No Virus is an organic viricide made with a unique combination of herbs.

agro_products.name: Legend
agro_products.discription: Legend® bio solutions is loaded with Sulphur and Bio active Molecules apart from Potash It is a powder formulation containing organic Potash that helps in activation & expression of genes because it is based on SURGE Technology (Selective Upregulation of Gene Expression). Legend® bio solutions is a certfied Organic Fertilizer that helps improve overall quality of produce & helps in higher yield.

agro_products.name: Marshal
agro_products.discription: Broad spectrum insecticide that gives effective control over chewing and sucking pests in various crops Marshal® insecticide through its dual contact and stomach poison action on the pests

agro_products.name: Nativo
agro_products.discription: Nativo is a new combination fungicide containing Tebuconazole and Trifloxystrobin. Nativo is a systemic broad-spectrum fungicide with protective and curative action which offers not only a disease control but also improves quality and yield of crop.

agro_products.name: Avtar
agro_products.discription: t is a unique combination fungicide, besides controlling many diseases provides Zinc nutrition also.

agro_products.name: Gateway
agro_products.discription: Tata Rallis Gateway is a broad-spectrum insecticide based on Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC. It is highly effective against Lepidopteran insect pests, especially at the larval stage. Its unique mode of action helps control pests that have developed resistance to other insecticides. It is safe for natural predators, pollinators, and beneficial arthropods, making it an eco-friendly choice for integrated pest management.

agro_products.name: Saaf
agro_products.discription: A proven & classic fungicide with systemic & contact action. Most trusted & widely used dual mode of action fungicide With a legacy spanning decades, Saaf is among the most trusted fungicides in India, effective across a range of crops and diseases.

agro_products.name: Nature deep
agro_products.discription: Nature Deep powder in this packet is sufficient enough to seed treatment/ soil drenching to the given area to be broadcasted or given seeding for root dipping depending upon specified crops as denoted on the packet Mix the inoculate with seed gently with a minimum amount of water, taking care to avoid damage to the seed coat Dry the inoculated seed under shade over a clean surface.
